name: id
description: This is used for the main component and to compose id attribute for each item.

name: namePrefix
description: Optional prefix. This is used to prefix each `item.name` using `"-"`.

name: items
description: An array of input objects with name, value and classes.

params.name: id
params.description: Item-specific id. If provided, it will be used instead of the generated id.

params.name: label
params.description: Item-specific label text. If provided, this will be used instead of `name` for item label text.

params.name: inputmode
params.description: Optional value for [the inputmode attribute](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/inputmode). Defaults to `"numeric"`.

params.name: value
params.description: Optional initial value of the input.

params.name: autocomplete
params.description: Attribute to [identify input purpose](https://www.w3.org/WAI/WCAG21/Understanding/identify-input-purpose.html), for instance `"postal-code"` or `"username"`. See [Autofilling form controls: the autocomplete attribute](https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/form-control-infrastructure.html#autofill) for the full list of attributes that can be used.

params.name: pattern
params.description: Attribute to [provide a regular expression pattern](https://www.w3.org/TR/html51/sec-forms.html#the-pattern-attribute), used to match allowed character combinations for the input value.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the date input item.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the date input item.

name: fieldset
description: Options for the fieldset component (for example legend).

name: errorMessage
description: Options for the error message component. The error message component will not display if you use a falsy value for `errorMessage`, for example `false` or `null`.

name: formGroup
description: Additional options for the form group containing the date input component.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the form group (for example to show error state for the whole group).

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the date-input container.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the date-input container.

name: values
description: An optional object use to specify value attributes for the date parts without setting rows.

name: values.day
description: Value attribute for the day input.

name: values.month
description: Value attribute for the month input.

name: values.year
description: Value attribute for the year input.
